sentences.en: They are already battling to eradicate illnesses such as malaria and tetanus.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在为根除疟疾、破伤风等疾病而斗争。

sentences.en: The campaign to eradicate malaria did not do so.
sentences.cn: 根除疟疾运动没有做到这样。

sentences.en: Surely we will aim to finally eradicate disease and poverty.
sentences.cn: 当然，我们的目标是最终能够消灭疾病和贫困。
